mapper.select: SELECT st.id as student_id, st.NAME, st.analysis_no, st.id_card, st.YEAR, st.gender, st.student_code, st.avatar, st.create_time, st.update_time, st.school_id, sc.NAME AS school, sc.district_id, d.NAME AS district FROM student st LEFT JOIN school sc ON sc.id = st.school_id LEFT JOIN district d ON sc.district_id = d.id LIMIT #{page},#{limit}

SELECT st.id as student_id, st.NAME, st.analysis_no, st.id_card, st.YEAR, st.gender, st.student_code, st.avatar, st.create_time, st.update_time, st.school_id, sc.NAME AS school, sc.district_id, d.NAME AS district FROM student st LEFT JOIN school sc ON sc.id = st.school_id LEFT JOIN district d ON sc.district_id = d.id where st.NAME like concat('%','å§š','%') LIMIT 1,5000

SELECT st.id as student_id, st.NAME, st.analysis_no, st.id_card, st.YEAR, st.gender, st.student_code, st.avatar, st.create_time, st.update_time, st.school_id, sc.NAME AS school, sc.district_id, d.NAME AS district FROM student st LEFT JOIN school sc ON sc.id = st.school_id LEFT JOIN district d ON sc.district_id = d.id WHERE st.id = #{id}
